item.description:
4/9 UPDATE: Hey everyone, I tried to get enough tables/chairs for everyone that has RSVP'd with the group(s), but they told me that the place will be mobbed and they will hold a few booths for us.  To let you know they will be taking away most of the tables/chairs to make more room for a bigger dance floor.  So we will all sit and hang out at the booths.  Supino's is going to be rocking!!!!

 

I am sure that those dancing shoes have been getting a work out lately.... so why should they rest now.  Quick get them on and head down to Supino's to dance the night away to an awesome band with some great friends!  We look forward to seeing you.

 

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone: 978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues? Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event. Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come on in and find us.
item.name: Dancing to Don't Call Me Shirley... Yup another new location!
